content.raw:
I used the attribute self.running to avoid multiple starts or stops (start->start->start), instead of the regular start->stop->start->stop cycle. The attribute can be accessed by the two different threads, so I just avoid problems with race conditions. The start and stop are subscribed to different topics.

On the other hand I prefer to run the whole start and stop methods in a "transactional way". Otherwise, if I'm in the middle of the update_counting and I receive the stop, the behavior might be a little unpredictable.
